Title: 40951 - # Finance Tips for Small Business Owners
Direction: 675 words. List 4-8 tips for small business owners who are trying to manage the finances of their business. You can discuss options like automated bill pay, online accounting and invoicing, choosing the right investors, creating realistic budgets, etc. Your target audience is small business owners who are seeking advice on handling their companies finances. You can easily link to the target URL by mentioning Sage One’s software for online invoicing and accounting.
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: online invoicing with Sage One
